name: delta.js
description: achieve modularity and separation of concerns through feature-oriented development

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && webpack && uglifyjs dist/delta.js -mo dist/delta.min.js --in-source-map dist/delta.js.map --source-map dist/delta.min.js.map && uglifyjs dist/delta.full.js -mo dist/delta.full.min.js --in-source-map dist/delta.full.js.map --source-map dist/delta.full.min.js.map
